name: intellihub
description: Provides structured, read-only access to the MonTamerGens ai_context knowledge hub.

functions.name: list_files
functions.description: Returns a list of all files within the ai_context directory.

functions.name: read_file
functions.description: Reads and returns the contents of a Markdown file using a relative path from ai_context.

path.description: Relative path to the file, e.g. 'lore_core.md' or 'schemas/seed_type_schema.md'.

functions.name: search
functions.description: Searches across all Markdown files in ai_context and returns matching snippets.

query.description: Search term to look for within the documentation.

functions.name: get_schema
functions.description: Returns the contents of a schema file from the schemas/ directory.

name.description: Schema name without suffix, e.g. 'seed_type' or 'mutagen'.

functions.name: get_module_purpose
functions.description: Returns the contents of a module purpose file from module_purposes/.

name.description: Module name without suffix, e.g. 'monsterseed' or 'mon_forge'.

functions.name: diagnose
functions.description: Performs a full health check of the ai_context knowledge capsule, verifying path validity, file inventory, schema health, module purpose health, search index functionality, and overall status.
